item.title: Threat Report: France Country Snapshot - Threat Report 1H2022
item.description: EMEA experienced a 7 percent increase in DDoS attacks, with many of those tied to the conflict between Russia and Ukraine.
item.dc:creator: Betty Braden-Navarro

item.title: Threat Report: Brazil Country Snapshot - Threat Report 1H2022
item.description: The LATAM region experienced an increase of 125 percent in botnet-based TCP floods.
item.dc:creator: Betty Braden-Navarro

item.description: The LATAM region experienced an increase of 125 percent in botnet-based TCP floods.
item.dc:creator: Betty Braden-Navarro

item.title: Threat Report: Canada Country Snapshot - Threat Report 1H2022
item.description: North America experienced 1.04 million DDoS attacks in the six-month period, with adversaries increasingly targeting cloud-related service providers and even primary schools.
item.dc:creator: Betty Braden-Navarro

item.title: Threat Report: Australia Country Snapshot - Threat Report 1H2022
item.description: The APAC region experienced about 8,600 DDoS attacks per day – or a new attack launched every 10 seconds.
item.dc:creator: Betty Braden-Navarro
